issue.title: [C++] Don't require Boost static libraries to support CentOS 7
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-647](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-647). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
CentOS 7 provides boost-system and boost-filesystem packages but they
include only shared libraries. They don't include static libraries.

Apache Arrow C++ requires Boost static libraries only for tests and
utilities. We can support CentOS 7 by making Boost static libraries
optional.
